description.elevator: GMI is a multinational manufacturing corporation specializing in industrial automation and robotics systems.
description.detailed:
Global Manufacturing Industries (GMI) is a Fortune 500 manufacturing company that designs, builds, and services industrial automation systems and robotics for factories worldwide. With over 40 years of experience, GMI serves automotive, aerospace, electronics, and consumer goods manufacturers.

The company operates 27 manufacturing facilities across 15 countries and employs over 35,000 people globally. GMI's product portfolio includes robotic assembly systems, automated material handling solutions, and factory management software.

GMI is recognized as an industry leader in sustainable manufacturing practices and has committed to achieving net-zero emissions across all operations by 2030.
description.founding: Founded in 1982 by Dr. Robert Chen to bring advanced robotics technology to American manufacturing.
